channel.title: Online Money
channel.description:
Probably not the best community I could find to ask this question, but: Does anybody know of any small corner of the internet where actually DECENT money can be made? (I'm 21, so age is not really a problem if need be over 18 with verified ID or something.)
I work at a movie theater and it's getting to be the 'slow' season, so they're cutting down on our shifts. This doesn't help with my saving up for a motorcycle right now, and so I need some other on-the-side way to make some money. I don't need like $15/hour or anything, but decent chump change is always nice.
I've worked for ChaCha before, made about $100 after MANY hours. (Their money per-question is crap.) I've also done the "Help people do the Get A Free iPad ads and they pay you" scheme, and made a few hundred. But that's going down the drain as fewer companies offer that sort of thing.
So, yeah, any suggestions? (Preferably with some sort of experience or knowledge of somebody who's done it successfully.)
Thanks!

item.title: Online Money
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

As you stated not the best idea in the world to ask this community.
http://www.101waystomakemoney.com/ is a good way to start.
Alternatively get another job or get a second Job. maybe?

Edit: Ever heard of Money flipping websites?
http://www.101waystomakemoney.com/make-money-flipping-websites/

Read full topic
